title: Topic 002 Question 010
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system and a computer named Computer1 that runs Windows 11.
You need to deploy the Azure Stack Hub PowerShell tools to Computer1.
options: Copy the AzureStack module from the Hardware Lifecycle Host (HLH).
Download AzureStack-Tools from the GitHub repository.
Download the AzureStack module from PowerShell Gallery.
